name: Liberty Society
description: Liberty Society is a social enterprise, of eco & impactful B2B merchandise & hampers that empowers marginalized women. Through our training to-employment model, we give purpose and dignity back to refugee communities & disadvantaged communities, to increase their income and overall livelihood. We help corporations appreciate and value their team, supporters, or clients with curated personalized goods & gifts that are loving to the people and the planet. liberty-society.com/upcycling-service
